structure.unit: ARTICLE F. - TRANSIENT OCCUPANCY TAX; CONVENTION AND VISITORS BUREAU
Sec. 2-2086. - RETENTION OF ADMINISTRATIVE AND COLLECTION EXPENSES.

law.catch_line: RETENTION OF ADMINISTRATIVE AND COLLECTION EXPENSES.
law.text: The City of Raleigh shall retain three (3) per cent of the gross proceeds of the tax collected to pay its costs for administrative and collection expenses. (Ord. No. 1986-825A, ยง1, 7-15-86)
